attributes.action: Create a watchdog & register to ensure the credibility of executives and dealers in 'the city'. These people have been 'playing' with our economy for their own personal benefit for years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We all know that banks have a hard job to do, but then so do nurses, cleaners etc! 

It is completely unacceptable that these people are earning colossal bonus packages for creating what is tantamount to false wealth. It is verging on fraud.

Short term strategies for banks are unacceptable, they are institutions, which, are supposed to be the backbones of our society. I would like to propose that in order to be an executive of a bank, or a dealer in 'the city', you should have to join a register in order that your credibility is understood by all. 

These reckless bankers have been 'playing' with our economies for nothing other than their own personal gain.

The entire world depends on banks for stability, this is about to be lost. Once we start losing stability, then it is fairly safe to assume that wars of some sort will be around the corner.

The government needs to act, and act long term for the stability of all.
